t: Leonard Cohen Vinyl Records — Dutch Vinyl Record Store
s: Leonard Cohen was a Canadian singer-songwriter and poet who was widely renowned for his insightful, emotionally honest and often darkly humorous lyrical content. He began his career as a poet, publishing several books of poetry before embarking on a musical career in 1967.
